name: Fishing For Your Keys
description:
Made in three days for the Lame Jam 16 (theme: "Fishing").

 Instead of picking the most common definition of fishing I went with the second one and made a game where you fish for your keys in your pockets. The levels are quite rushed but I hope you like the game :). This is my first jam ever and it's been a blast. Thanks to everyone participating and making it possible!

In case the WebGL build doesn't load, you can download a Windows executable below :).
